# FurScript

> Clinical-grade pet health tracking for iOS. Turn everyday pet observations into vet-ready SOAP reports.

FurScript is a mobile application that helps pet owners maintain professional-quality health records for their animals. It uses the SOAP clinical documentation format — the same standard used by veterinarians and human healthcare providers worldwide — to structure daily health observations into actionable medical records.

## Key Facts
- Platform: iOS 18+
- Price: Free with optional Pro subscription ($5.99/month or $35.99/year)
- Privacy: 100% on-device data storage, zero data collection
- Developer: Sungjun Yoon
- Launch: February 2026

## Features
- Clinical SOAP report generation (PDF export)
- AI Observation Decoder: natural language notes → structured clinical data (on-device)
- Medication tracking with dose progress and reminders
- Vaccination records with due date alerts
- Multi-pet support (dogs, cats, rabbits, and more)
- Sign in with Apple authentication

## What Makes FurScript Different
- Uses the actual SOAP format that vets are trained to read
- AI runs entirely on-device — no data sent to external servers
- Zero data collection — complete user privacy
- Output designed to integrate into real veterinary workflows
